ConnectionStrings.DbConnectionString: it should be a connection string

JwtParameters.AuthenticationSecretKey: this should be secret key for authentication
JwtParameters.EmailVerificationSecretKey: this should be secret key for email verificaition
JwtParameters.PasswordResetSecretKey: this should be secret key for password reset
JwtParameters.Issuer: this should be address of this backend
JwtParameters.AuthenticationAudience: this should be address of this backend
